# oci_ref (Data Source)

Image ref data source



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `ref` (String) Image ref to lookup

### Read-Only

- `digest` (String) Image digest of the image.
- `id` (String) Fully qualified image digest of the image.
